    • variant

      Variant

    • variant

      default OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder variant(Function<Enums.VariantName.Provider, Enums.VariantName> variant)
      Variant

    • fen

      OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder fen(String fen)
      Parameters:
      fen - FEN of the root position Example: "rnbqkbnr/ppp1pppp/8/3pP3/8/8/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKBNR b KQkq - 0 2"

    • play

      OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder play(String play)
      Comma separated sequence of legal moves in UCI notation. Play additional moves starting from fen.
      Required to find an opening name, if fen is not an exact match for a named position.
      Example: "e2e4,e7e5,c2c4,c7c6,c4e5"

    • speeds

      OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder speeds(Set<Enums.Speed> speeds)
      One or more game speeds to look for

    • speeds

      default OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder speeds(Enums.Speed... speeds)
      One or more game speeds to look for

    • ratings

      OpeningExplorerApiAuth.LichessBuilder ratings(Set<Enums.RatingGroup> ratings)
      One or more rating groups, ranging from their value to the next higher group

    • ratings

      default OpeningExplorerApiAuth.LichessBuilder ratings(Enums.RatingGroup... ratings)

    • since

      OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder since(String since)
      Include only games from this month or later
      Default "2017-04"

    • until

      OpeningExplorerApiAuth.HistoryBuilder until(String until)
      Include only games from this month or earlier
      Default "3000-12"
